item.text: Added: Anagramming, Arcticons (light & dark), Aurora [Droid, Services, Store], Backdrops, Brave, Iceraven, Immich, Mealie, Oto Music, YouTube Vanced.
Made sheep wool in icon a little bit whiter.
Made Mastodon icon usable (even if it isn't mapped to anything).
Fixed Port Authority icon (hopefully for good this time).
Shortened ampersand leg in Simply Plural.
Added the MIT license to the app.
Added some new icons: Aptoide, Bandcamp, Delta Icons, Mastodon, PIA VPN, and Simply Plural.
Removed Wallpapers section- I don't ever plan on adding any.
First release, powered by Blueprint. See About section for more info!
